channel.title: behavior-patterns on Dwarves Foundation
channel.description: Recent content in behavior-patterns on Dwarves Foundation

item.title: Command Pattern
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: What is the Command Design Pattern? Command is a behavioral design pattern that encapsulates a request as an object. This allows you to parameterize methods with different requests, delay or queue a request’s execution, and support undoable operations.

item.title: State Pattern
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: The State Design Pattern is a behavioral design pattern that allows an object to change its behavior when its internal state changes.
